com.metreeca.rest

Class Result<V,E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.rest.Result<V,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of the value possibly returned by the operation
    E - the type of the error possibly reported by the operation

    public abstract class Result<V,E>
extends Object
    Operation result.

    Describes the result of an operation that could either successfully return a value or report an error.

        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of the value returned by the operation
        E - the type of the error possibly reported by the operation
        Parameters:
        value - the value returned by the operation
        Returns:
        a result providing access to the value returned by the operation

      • Error

        public static <V,E> Result<V,E> Error(E error)
        Creates an operation result with a reported error.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of the value possibly returned by the operation
        E - the type of the error reported by the operation
        Parameters:
        error - the error reported by the operation
        Returns:
        a result providing access to the error reported by the operation

      • value

        public Optional<V> value()
        Retrieves the operation returned value.
        Returns:
        an optional operation returned value, if one is present; an empty optional, otherwise

      • error

        public Optional<E> error()
        Retrieves the operation reported error.
        Returns:
        an optional operation reported error, if one is present; an empty optional, otherwise

      • value

        public <R> Result<R,E> value(Function<V,R> mapper)
        Maps the operation returned value.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type of the mapped returned value
        Parameters:
        mapper - the value mapping function
        Returns:
        a result providing access to the value generated by applying mapper to the returned value of this result, if one was present; a result providing access to the reported error of this result, otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null or returns a null value

      • error

        public <R> Result<V,R> error(Function<E,R> mapper)
        Maps the operation reported error.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type of the mapped reported error
        Parameters:
        mapper - the error mapping function
        Returns:
        a result providing access to the error generated by applying mapper to the reported error of this result, if one was present; a result providing access to the returned value of this result, otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null or returns a null value

      • process

        public <R> Result<R,E> process(Function<V,Result<R,E>> mapper)
        Process the operation returned value.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type of the mapped returned value
        Parameters:
        mapper - the value processing function
        Returns:
        a result generated by applying mapper to the returned value of this result, if one was present; a result providing access to the reported error of this result, otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null or returns a null value

      • recover

        public <R> Result<V,R> recover(Function<E,Result<V,R>> mapper)
        Recovers from the operation reported error.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type of the mapped reported error
        Parameters:
        mapper - the error recovering function
        Returns:
        a result generated by applying mapper to the reported error of this result, if one was present; a result providing access to the returned value of this result, otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null or returns a null value

      • use

        public Result<V,E> use(Consumer<V> success,
                       Consumer<E> failure)
        Handles operations results.
        Parameters:
        success - a consumer accepting the operation returned value
        failure - a consumer accepting the operation reported error
        Returns:
        this result
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either success or failure is null

      • fold

        public abstract <R> R fold(Function<V,R> success,
                           Function<E,R> failure)
        Folds operation results.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type of the final operation outcome
        Parameters:
        success - a function mapping from the returned value to the final operation outcome
        failure - a function mapping from the reported error to the final operation outcome
        Returns:
        the final operation outcome, as generated by either success or failure according to the result state
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either success or failure is null or returns a null value
